casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Michael REED 365A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2016 Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Reed, David Michael. E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*248The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2016."
